name: D-scorts
author: water_sinks
notes: I wanted to try for dragons to KOG, but the bricks were too heavy to carry for 5 straight wins (and it gets wrecked by Skylvans). I tried the build with Malicious+Dreamer but Malicious would always find a way to end up in my starting hand so I tossed him in the trash. Trap hole was big in the Amazoness match-up in case I couldn't pressure LPs with Anki.
